name: Pooping Pigeons
description:
Here's what people are saying about Pooping Pigeons:

"Hilarious! The sound effects alone had me in tears!" -- Gary H.

"This is the perfect game for killing time while I'm waiting for the bus. I love it!" -- Lisa G.

"The retro 8-bit graphics take me back to my youth. I can't get enough of this game!" -- Jim S.

As the saying goes, if you can't beat 'em, join 'em!

Getting revenge on a pigeon is not an easy thing to do, that's why we have turned the tables on this endless battle and developed a game that puts you in the pigeon's seat!

Pooping Pigeons is the best pigeon game on the market today, hands down. Impress your closest friends, beat their high scores, laugh uncontrollably at the sound effects and most importantly... enjoy a little youthful humor.

One final piece of advice:

Pasting a car is highly encouraged, but upset a passer-by and it will be your last bowel movement!

Now get out there and have some fun.
#pigeonlife
